text: @CNNPolitics Rand Paul is an idiot.  Not only did he disrespect  a scientist and Dr who has remarkably more knowledge of the subject matter; he continued to berate dr fauci for not opening schools even tho dr Fauci knows how dangerous and contagious coronavirus is to the general public. 🙉
